cafeteria noun /ˌkæf.əˈtɪə.ri.ə/ /-ˈtɪr.i-/ n [ C ] Definition a restaurant (often in a factory, a college or an office building) where people collect food and drink from a serving area and take it to a table themselves after paying for it (Definition of cafeteria noun from the Cambridge Advanced Learner's Dictionary&Thesaurus ©Cambridge University Press) + Free Dictionary Toolbar for Browsers + Add Dictionary Search to iGoogle and your website
